title: Riot is removing your Ranked practice mode
body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season

> Normal Draft will be retired at the start of preseason for all regions except North America, Europe West, and Brazil.

Ok, it's not affecting us in NA...

> In an ideal world, we’d like to retire normal draft in all regions.

...yet.

Riot, Blind Pick is toxic. It promotes toxicity within the team right off the bat by rewarding autolocking, and doesn't provide an appropriate environment for preparing for Ranked play because it allows for mirror matches and (obviously) does not provide the same pick/ban phase. Normal Draft is an absolute necessity whether the player pool is small or not.
> Our goal is to offer the fewest number of queues that give unique experiences 

This isn't Dominion, where only a handful of players used it and it was just a "fun" mode. It is *a very good thing* that the mode is identical to Ranked play. I'm never going to play Blind Pick again, even if I have to practice first time champions in Ranked.

I'm upset and I'm in NA where it won't [yet] be removed. I can't imagine how the millions of players you're actively screwing over are taking it.

replies.body: Well, haha, guess I'll finally become the guy that tries Yasuo for the first time in someone's promos :D
Why not? If you're first timing champions in ranked your rank will suck and so will your enemies.

I have been having a blast playing with Draft mode, and I seriously hate Blind pick with a passion.

Please don't do this, damn it.

there's a **reason** i don't play blind pick. i absolutely despise getting my desired role only 5% of the time, and getting support or jungle the other 95% (either due to not calling it fast enough or someone claiming to have called it before i even loaded into the lobby). then there's the fact that there are no bans, no counterpicking, and mirror matchups. now, the mirror isn't as much of a problem (just gotta play better than my enemy right?), but there are some champions that i hate playing against and they are played every game if not banned (or at least feels like it).

draft is the only way i can have fun after team builder was removed. i don't want to lose that too...

Not to mention if you're a large distance from the rest of your team the chat can show you called it first but everyone else sees the other person called it first.  Yes, this has actually happened to me when I was climbing levels a couple years ago.
I can see why they would remove it for smaller regions. Queue times can be hell. We're just lucky we aren't in that region
they plan to remove it in our regions later.  It's a way to quiet down the outcry.

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AvH0dgAq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-08T21:20:47.737+0000)
>
> they plan to remove it in our regions later.  It's a way to quiet down the outcry.

They never said that. They said it would be ideal _if they could_.

Yeah, they cleared that wording up real fast http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/iqcQYuBZ-so-normal-draft 
crisis averted for now.
Since when the fuck is EUNE a small region? It takes like only 4 minutes to find a match for the highly wanted positions, 1 or 2 minutes if you are a support.
I play on EUNE and the queue times aren't that bad. However, I am low-elo and play occasionaly, that may be the thing.

They should remove both blind and draft and make a mode that's in the middle then.
Position-select with bans at the start then all blind-pick.
Lower champ-select time, still have bans, and nobody would have to spam their role in chat.

However I'd like it, compromise is impossible.

**Position Select**
This may be the only compromise part. If you select primary position, with fixed algorithm you do get it most of times. Even If you get secondary now and then, you still have better chance to play the lane you want than is the scream arena. If you don't care, pick Fill and swap If someone wants. The only shitty thing about this is newly forced Fill option which enforce you to play something you can't play while simultaneously you can't scream your role. But I think that's acceptable sacrifice.

**Blind vs Draft**
Draft pick is important to avoid extremly bad comp against extremly good comp. The reason we play Draft is to avoid ARAM-style games low-tier melees against high-tier rangeds which is merely enjoyable to any side. The reason, however, some play Blind, is so that undesired class/champ is not enforced on them just because their comp needs it and all the above players selfishly made their desired choices or so that their champ is not pre-picked by enemy. If we play in blind, more games will feel unbalanced and random. If they play in draft, they'll have to swallow the fact they can't be OTP and some people simply play that way.

**Bans vs Nonbans**
Some people OTP annoying or broken champ. Those who play broken champ because they are easy to play and outplay anyone, those I do not feel pitty of. However there are champs that now and then are not particulary overpowered or uncounterable (uncounterpickable), but people consider their playstyle toxic and annoying and thus they are basically permabanned. Those who OTP such champs would never get to play them. And that isn't fair as much as it is not fair to force us go into the scream-arena.

If we can't compromise then we end up with completely nothing.

**Position select**
Actually the biggest thing to draft.  I don't play blind because I don't want to scream my role and then still not get it because they instalocked.

**Blind vs Draft**
A ton of people just play blind bacause it's faster to get into a game.  I don't think there's an overwhelming malicious intent in Blind any more than there is in Draft (they still troll plenty in Draft to trick the opposing team into _thinking_ they are a different role/lane).  I think the people who care about comps will be able to manage the ones who want to Blind pick a champ no matter what, just like they do now in Draft.

**Bans vs Nonbans**
With you on this.  One it's kinda hard to find a middle ground there.  We'd almost need a Blind ban system where we pre-select two bans before entering and anything that 5/10 voted for would be banned.  Once people know the algorithm they might try to game it though.  Y'know, the whole "once it's live it acts differently" thing.
There's no argument or compromise that would convince me I need a Normal mode that isn't identical to Ranked Draft.

The only reason less people queue is how long the champ select is.
The population size is why they're removing it.
Blind-pick tastes like stamps and they probably want to boost ranked by removing draft this way and it's underhanded.
Yes there is: fun ≠ ranked. Play blind pick, the basic mode.
If they do remove normal draft, I will only use custom games to practice. The toxicity and game health costs for setting foot into a blind pick are way too high.
Delete normal both normal queues and replace with teambuilder. Easy peasy.
40 min queues waiting for support, just what people always wanted!
The only reason it took so long to find a support in teambuilder was because there were THREE!! normal queue types. If there were only one, it would take substantially less time.

Without normal draft there to give me the opportunity to play against gold+ players I would have never made it to Gold. Ranked is good and all but it's hard to learn from your mistakes when you are placed strictly against people only a couple of divisions above you. If League is as large as Riot tells us it is then there should be no reason they would have to consolidate the queues

Draft is toxic. It promotes toxicity with the team right off the bat with people getting upset they didnt get the role they wanted which can cause them to A) dodge or B) troll or the champion they wanted to play gets banned which can also cause the above. In some case's your own team will ban a champion you hover because they don't want you playing it. Its also harder to play off meta for the same reason above. I really don't care if they take draft away or not because i dont play it, i think they should just keep both but if your reason for keeping it is because blind is toxic you need a better one

How often has this actually happened to you. Typically for me it's option A, if at all ever. I would prefer someone to dodge because they didn't get the role they want. I have to wait what 30 seconds longer to replace a potential instalocker while he has to wait 6 mins? Seems, #wurf
remove it, worthless queue

What they meant to say is that they would like to not have 2 different normal queques. This is a good strategy overall.

Obviously cropping out a queque is not the way to go except on poorly populated areas where it is a more extreme but necessary measure, so the "ideal world" they have in mind is one where there is a single non-ranked q that combines the good of draft and blind normal pick.. This is a good thing because it omogenized player experience across the globe, and a bad idea because it does not allow a player to be flexible on how they want to play.

It does not mean the "ideal world" is a "practical world" either - it is probably just an idea that they have to chase but that is unreachable, but it is worth to have to they have something to strive on.
Meanwhile teambuilder was a great inbetween option that riot dropped like it was rabid rat.

I regularly got 20+ minute waiting times on Teambuilder. Eventually people just gave in and allowed that Jax Support just so they could play at all, and then someone else dodged because they don't want to play with a Jax support. Another person leaves because they don't want to wait, then the leader disbands the lobby and now you're back where you started with 20 minutes wasted.

It really wasn't. It was only a stepping stone for the New Champion Select, and it had huge problems with queue times because people won't willingly fill the high priority roles if they don't have to and the leader would constantly kick out players that weren't exactly what they wanted.

I just want to say because this is the only one I think really addresses it:

I queue Normal Draft because people are **less toxic**. I rarely play ranked due to my internet being spotty (I spike to 400~500 ping at least 5 times a game), but I prefer the more competitive environment because there's generally less flaming due to champion select. I even get away with really weird support picks because at the end of the day people just want to play... 

Anyway, I've played since Season 1 and I haven't played Normal Blind since the day Draft came out (unless a group of friends invited me or something). My choice is always draft due to bans, picking phase, and the general increase in communication that comes from a longer picking phase.
who needs practice for ranked below diamond?

You've got that backwards. Look at any high elo stream when a new champion comes out and you'll see the new champion all over the place. Why? Because Ranked *is* their Normals.

Everyone below Diamond keeps a distinction between the two.

Ive played literally 1000s of blind pick games and it really isnt that bad.

I just pick which champion i want to play and play it.

Means ive supported and jungled almost every champion in the game. And i rarely ever get flamed even while playing stuff like tryn support

So your advice is to only play Support and Jungle?

Ok.

Same, there is a lot of over exaggeration here.  But at the end of the day blind will always be the more popular mode because of the low champ select time and the ability to pick troll picks without being flamed.

I play Normal draft more then anything else in this game. High queue times are annoying sometimes but I would almost always chose higher queue time with option to select position i want to play before low queue time and to have to fight for the position i want or to get stuck with something i do not enjoy playing or even worse to get people trolling because they didn't get what they wanted. Normal draft needs to stay! Make it work RIot! Better remove blind and keep draft!
just instalock xd

If they do it, i will have to play Mundo, Teemo Support, etc. in ranked then. no problem for me, i am already looking forward to the flames.

BTW, will it then be allowed to create a macro with the text "picking off-meta is not reportable" and "muted and reported cause of insult"?
we don't even have draft pick in OCE... :(

Yeah let's remove the most useful queue to keep the most toxic and useless one. 
Sure it's more casual but the idea of having to go through "mid or feed" or "i said top first you liar!!!" is making me sad. And where are we are supposed to test picks at that point? Where? I won't be able neither to pick the role nor the champ and if i'm unlucky i will be against a mirror making the whole experience completely useless since in ranked there aren't mirrors.

How it is possible that one of the most played game in the world has queue problems?
Are you high Rito? Normal draft isn't perfect, but it's WAY better than the instalocking toxic mess that is Blind.
Not to mention it's the only thing that sort of replaces Teambuilder

Riot if you're reading this I never post about changes on the forums. This has, in many years, been the first topic I've cared enough to post on. 

Blind pick is incredibly toxic. It's a reason I stopped playing a while back. Arguing over who typed mid first. Threatening to play a character in a role that dosent work if they don't get their pick. AFKing or feeding if they don't get their pick. Mirror match ups. No bans. I'm sure there are a other faults. 

I thought riot created team builder to FIX the nasty blind pick mode but only left blind pick in as fan service. So people wouldn't complain about it being gone. When clearly team builder was the way to go for the better of the game. I'm amazed that we're trying to remove it now. 

Please don't make blind pick the only option for normals. Please.

What the fuck? Riot. I don't want to play ranked. But I fucking not. And I mean not what so ever, have to play a game of fucking "who can type the word the fastest" just to maybe get my role. I don't care about the queue times, just give me the opportunity to just pick roles, and calmly play a game.

I was hoping for a fill-except option. I don't always need to pick my role, just not always support. Now what do I get? No option at all. Just type fast. Wtf...

> I'm never going to play Blind Pick again, even if I have to practice first time champions in Ranked.

The irony is... Since I can't take ~~DynaBoostQ~~ FlexQ seriously... Those of us who don't take their rank in FlexQ seriously have a new, little bit dangerous, but still satisfying, playground with rank different than that of SoloQ :D First-time all you want, there's no other place to try now. That is, If one is part of second-world servers like EUNE.
I think we need both? Or just keep draft? I just want some casual environment. I dont play blind pick but maybe that is where I can take my off meta shit?

Sure make myself a casual support teemo.. Be forced into ranked.. 

Normally I keep it in draft normals.. But he'll if hats what riot wants.. 

I guess I can auto lock teemo in blinds aswell.  Won't make much of a difference.

 I get flamed either way.
To be fair, riot is releasing a sandbox mode so we can just practice our mechanics a lot. From there you can then go to ranked.

I will say the same thing I told people last year when they changed soloq. STOP PLAYING.

It didn't apply to me last year because I never played soloq and had no interest in dynamicQ but if riot removes Normal Draft I will just stop playing.

They don't see 1000 thread on boards as a threat to the game they don't see 1000 threads on Reddit as a threat what they see is the number of people playing the game. If you don't like the direction then stop playing and they will be forced to respond.
